title: Tim Whitcome (off-roader, producer)
description: Our friend and Threadlines co-founder Tim Whitcome stops by, we talk about the ZL1 Camaro, the McLaren MP4-12C, and the tacky shit that people do to their cars.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
content:encoded: Our friend and Threadlines co-founder Tim Whitcome stops by, we talk about the ZL1 Camaro, the McLaren MP4-12C, and the tacky shit that people do to their cars.
